tooltip.solpotato.hearty.not_eaten: Not yet eaten! What does it taste like?
tooltip.solpotato.cheap: This food is not nourishing enough to improve your health.
tooltip.solpotato.disabled.blacklist: This food is in the blacklist and thus cannot improve your health.
tooltip.solpotato.disabled.whitelist: This food is not in the whitelist and thus cannot improve your health.
command.solpotato.foodlist.no_permission: You do not have the permissions necessary to apply this command to other players!
command.solpotato.foodlist.size.desc.mil: You sadly cannot gain any more health from trying new foods.
You need %s more to increase your max health.
message.solpotato.milestone_achieved: What a unique flavor! You've gained %s!
message.solpotato.finished.chat: Your desire to seek unique foods is finally satisfied.
message.solpotato.finished.hotbar: You've gained %s. Your desire to seek unique foods is finally satisfied.
gui.solpotato.food_book.benefits.active_: Because your food diversity is greater than this threshold, this benefit is active.
gui.solpotato.food_book.benefits.inactiv: If your food diversity becomes greater than this threshold, this benefit will activate.
gui.solpotato.food_book.queue.food_queue: A list of all foods eaten in the past that contribute to your food diversity.
gui.solpotato.food_book.config.tooltip.m: The minimum hunger value foods need to provide in order to count towards milestones.
gui.solpotato.food_book.config.tooltip.h: Out of %1$s foods, %2$s are nourishing enough to improve your health.
gui.solpotato.food_book.config.tooltip.e: Out of the %1$s foods that aren't nourishing enough to improve your health, you've eaten %2$s.
gui.solpotato.food_book.config.tooltip.b: How many foods have been disabled by the blacklist.
gui.solpotato.food_book.config.tooltip.w: How many foods the whitelist allows.
